plot: Jeff, a martial arts teacher, residing in Hong Kong shares what martial arts and the Word of God mean to him and to his students. He uses Jesus' life and as an example of how to live his own life and invest in the lives of his students.
title: Pray the Word-Jeff
plot_es: Jeff, a martial arts teacher, residing in Hong Kong shares what martial arts and the Word of God mean to him and to his students. He uses Jesus' life and as an example of how to live his own life and invest in the lives of his students.
plot_en: Jeff, a martial arts teacher, residing in Hong Kong shares what martial arts and the Word of God mean to him and to his students. He uses Jesus' life and as an example of how to live his own life and invest in the lives of his students.
